Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24468276]Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV):inhibition of JEV infection in BHK-21 cells(IC50~100 Î¼M).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: E glycoprotein has been identified as the major antigenic determinant on flavivirus particles and mediates binding and fusion during viral entry,DIII has been proposed to act as the binding region for the cellular receptor. And the peptide could bingding with DIII domain and inhibit the initial step of JEV infection.

Literature.Title: Peptide inhibitor of Japanese encephalitis virus infection targeting envelope protein domain III.
Literature.Author: Zu X, Liu Y, Wang S, Jin R, Zhou Z, Liu H, Gong R, Xiao G, Wang W.
